original_text: For the lips of a priest should guard knowledge, and people should seek instruction from his mouth, for he is the messenger of the Lord of hosts.
korean_text: 제사장의 입술은 지식을 지켜야 하겠고 사람들은 그의 입에서 율법을 구하게 되어야 할 것이니 제사장은 만군의 여호와의 사자가 됨이거늘

sentences.original_text: For the lips of a priest should guard knowledge
and people should seek instruction from his mouth
sentences.korean_translation: 백성은 그의 입에서 가르침을 구해야 하며

sentences.original_text: for he is the messenger of the Lord of hosts
